title: Lime Jello Salad
ingredients: 1 (20oz) can crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved
instructions: In a large bowl, pour 1 cup boiling water over gelatin mix.
Stir until dissolved, then stir in 1/2 cup pineapple juice.
Refrigerate until thickened but not set, about 1 hr.
Meanwhile, place crushed pineapple and remaining juice in small saucepan. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for about 5 min.
In a large bowl, blend softened cream cheese and lime gelatin until smooth.
In a medium bowl, whip cream until soft peaks form.
Pour into a pretty crystal bowl and refrigerate for at least 4 hrs or until set.
